dbdc38da4929.bio: International Journalist/Writer, poker fan, home brewer, business development professional. My opinions are certainly my own, feel free to debate, not argue.
dbdc38da4929.name: Matt Waldron

e7debf5fc004.bio: President & Co-founder of The New Agenda. fmr Wall Street Exec. Advocate for women’s & LGBT rights, & equality. Mom. Gay. Dog lover. Jock. Nerd. I smile a lot!
e7debf5fc004.name: Amy Siskind

c79a2dea0a1b.bio: Originally from NJ now living in MD. Just a guy with a smartphone looking to learn.
c79a2dea0a1b.name: Mark Ricks

a4c89308481a.bio: Left-leaning centrist. I appreciate well reasoned perspectives, logical political debate, and anyone who strives to not be stubbornly partisan.
a4c89308481a.name: PoliticalKel🗽

paragraphs.text: Eric Trump filed to bring in foreign workers to work at his Trump Winery. A lawyer working for him said, “It’s difficult to find people.”

NYT reported that a US led coalition is investigating a strike in Mosul which killed up to 200 civilians — the highest toll for an American attack in Iraq since 2003. Unlike Obama who acted in a way to protect civilians, this and Yemen showcase Trump’s complete disregard for human life.
paragraphs.name: 4fa6

paragraphs.text: As Trump’s bad week continued, the WSJ reported Kushner’s sale of 666 Fifth Avenue to a Chinese buyer for a $400mm profit, was teetering.
paragraphs.name: 1b2b

paragraphs.text: Thursday night on Hannity, in explaining his actions, Nunes said he felt a “duty and obligation” to Trump.
paragraphs.name: 71aa

paragraphs.text: Trump blamed the loss on Democrats, calling Pelosi and Schumer “losers.” The conservative WSJ Editorial Board blamed Republicans.
paragraphs.name: 1cc7

paragraphs.text: Trump continued to take credit for jobs he didn’t create, this time 20,000 jobs at Charter Communications announced last October.
paragraphs.name: 77a1

paragraphs.text: POLITICO reported that Federal career staffers are living in fear of being targeted and singled out by Breitbart conservative media outlets, for not being loyal to Trump.
paragraphs.name: 3cae

paragraphs.text: As Week 19 opened, Trump’s Gallup daily approval rating hit a new low: 37% approve, 58% disapprove.
paragraphs.name: 95b1

paragraphs.text: Three weeks have passed since Trump’s tweet that Obama wiretapped Trump Tower. He has yet to offer any evidence, or apologize.
paragraphs.name: c7f6

paragraphs.text: WSJ Editorial Board issued a blistering attack on Trump — “A President’s Credibility” in which they described how Trump’s constant lies and falsehoods were eroding public trust, abroad and at home.
paragraphs.name: a31f

paragraphs.text: Organizers of a Cinco de Mayo festival in Philadelphia canceled, fearing an ICE raid. The festival had been a Mexican folk tradition since 2006.
paragraphs.name: 92d9
b8ac
paragraphs.text: Hack

4e7870c7895c.title: Can’t get past #1 without getting mad.

content.subtitle: You can’t mop a floor in a Government building let alone be a Senator withou-- nevermind…

paragraphs.name: 7ab0
paragraphs.text: Can’t get past #1 without getting mad. He’s been demanding folks apologize for unfair treatment. This is the same man who also claimed that the President of the United States wasn’t a US citizen, demanding proof as if background checks don’t exist.

paragraphs.text: One can assume this regime likes to re-cycle and re-announce Obama-era accomplishments as their own because of their deep-seeded love of hyphenated words.
